ValidationRule.description: Force the related Reference PAC.Penalty & Interest Assessed value via the Penalty & Interest Assessed link field to have a value greater than the Payment Amount when the Payment Type = Warranty.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ($RecordType.Name = "PAC Warranty Record Type"), (Payment_Amount__c >= 0), (Payment_Amount__c > Penalty_Interest_Assessed_link__c), ($Profile.Name <>"System Administrator") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Payment amount requested is higher than P&I assessment field on Reference PAC record. Update payment amount being requested or correct P&I assessment field on Reference PAC record and resubmit warranty request.
